name: MAD MACHINES
description: Physics-based bat hitting ball game based on hockey, tennis and baseball played by robots. 1v1 to 3v3 online multiplayer sci-fi arena sport.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 @ 3GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
